channel.title: ssl on Blog Indonesiadot.Com
channel.description: Recent content in ssl on Blog Indonesiadot.Com
channel.item:
Letsencrypt certbot unatteded https://blog.indonesiadot.com/2020/01/19/letsencrypt-certbot-unatteded/ Sun, 19 Jan 2020 08:17:54 +0700
https://blog.indonesiadot.com/2020/01/19/letsencrypt-certbot-unatteded/ <<<<<<< HEAD Letsencrypt with certbot unatteded way This is for ubuntu linux add-apt-repository ppa:certbot/certbot -y apt install certbot -y certbot certonly --standalone --preferred-challenges http --non-interactive --staple-ocsp --agree-tos -m widyaunix@gmail.com -d harbor.example.com Note: before running certbot command, you must already pointing domain / subdomain address to destination ip Referensi: https://indonesiadot.com ======= Letsencrypt with certbot unatteded way This is for ubuntu linux add-apt-repository ppa:certbot/certbot -y apt install certbot -y certbot certonly --standalone --preferred-challenges http --non-interactive --staple-ocsp --agree-tos -m widyaunix@gmail.com -d harbor.example.com Note: before running certbot command, you must already pointing domain / subdomain address to destination ip Referensi: https://indonesiadot.com >>>>>>> 76b9dfedd4f807c5ef234d4614aced0b6b7eeca5
